completion:
Roses are red,
Violets are blue,
Red is the color of passion,
And it's found in me and you.

The sky is blue,
The ocean too,
Blue is the color of peace,
And all things fresh and new.

Grass is green,
Trees are too,
Green is the color of nature,
And all things that renew.

The sun is yellow,
Flowers too,
Yellow is the color of happiness,
And all things that bring a new view.

Oranges are orange,
The sunset too,
Orange is the color of warmth,
And all things that make us feel new.

Lilacs are purple,
Grapes too,
Purple is the color of royalty,
And all things that feel true.

Cherry blossoms are pink,
Flamingos too,
Pink is the color of love,
And all things that feel anew.

The night is black,
Coal too,
Black is the color of mystery,
And all things that bring a new clue.

Snow is white,
Clouds too,
White is the color of purity,
And all things that feel anew.

The sky is gray,
Rocks too,
Gray is the color of wisdom,
And all things that bring a new view.

Trees are brown,
Earth too,
Brown is the color of stability,
And all things that renew.

The flowers are magenta,
The sunset too,
Magenta is the color of joy,
And all things that feel anew.

The ocean is turquoise,
The sky too,
Turquoise is the color of serenity,
And all things that renew.

Lavender is purple,
But softer too,
Lavender is the color of calmness,
And all things that feel new.

Autumn leaves are maroon,
Wine too,
Maroon is the color of passion,
And all things that renew.

The sea is navy,
The sky too,
Navy is the color of depth,
And all things that feel new.

Olives are olive,
Forests too,
Olive is the color of peace,
And all things that renew.

Cyan is the color of the sea,
The sky too,
Cyan is the color of tranquility,
And all things that feel new.

The sun is gold,
Rings too,
Gold is the color of luxury,
And all things that renew.

Silver is the color of the moon,
Coins too,
Silver is the color of mystery,
And all things that feel anew.
